8ã€å¾®ä¿¡å°ç¨‹åºå®šä½çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚å¾®ä¿¡è·å–ç”¨æˆ·ç»åº¦çº¬åº¦ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œè¯·æ±‚é«˜å¾·APIè¿›è¡Œé€†åœ°å€è§£æï¼Œå¾—åˆ°ä½ç½®çœå¸‚ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚å†æ‹¿è·å–åˆ°çš„çœå¸‚ä¿¡æ¯ä¸åç›¾å•Šæ•°æ®åº“çš„å†…å®¹æŸ¥æ‰¾åŒ¹é…çš„cityIdã€‚

getLocation: () => {
    console.log(12345);
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      wx.getLocation({
        success: res => {
          console.log(res);
          const { longitude, latitude} = res;
          wx.request({
            url: `https://restapi.amap.com/v3/geocode/regeo?key=29ee6f42defaeec31b12762bd08b1d7b&location=${longitude},${latitude}`,
            success: locationRes => {
              console.log(locationRes)
              resolve(locationRes.data.regeocode.addressComponent.city)
            },
            fail: locationRes => {
              reject('åœ°å€è§£æå¤±è´¥')
            }
          })
        },
        reject : res => {
          console.log('fail', res)
        }
      })
    })
  },
  getCityList: () => {
    return new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      wx.request({
        url: `api/gityList`,
        success:(res) => {
          resolve(res);
        } ,
        fail: res => {
          reject('è·å–åŸå¸‚åˆ—è¡¨å¤±è´¥')
        }
      })
    })
  }
  Promise.all([this.getCityList(), this.getLocation()])
    .then(res => {
      console.log(res)
    })
    .catch(e => {
      console.log(e)
    })

9ã€Promise å¢åŠ  done æ–¹æ³•,å¤„äºå›è°ƒé“¾çš„å°¾ç«¯ï¼Œä¿è¯æŠ›å‡ºä»»ä½•é”™è¯¯çš„å¯èƒ½ã€‚

Promise.prototype.done = function (onfulfilled, onReject) {
  this.then(onFulfilled, onReject) 
    .catch(fucntion (reason) {
      setTimeout(() => {
        throw reason
      }, 0);
    })
}
